Package edu.jsu.mcis

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Arg
    Holds information about the argument.
    ArgsParser
    Creates arguments, parses the command line, and returns their values.
    XMLTools
    Allows XML input/output.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Arg.DataType
    Supported data types.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    FlagDefaultNotFalseException
    Case where a boolean named argument is not assigned "false" by default.
    HelpMessageException
    Usage information for the program.
    InvalidArgumentException
    Case where invalid values are assigned to positional arguments.
    InvalidNamedArgumentNameException
    Case where named arguments that do not exist are referenced.
    MutualExclusionException
    Errors related to mutual exclusion.
    RestrictedValuesException
    Case where a value that is not within a restricted set of allowed values is entered.
    TooFewArgumentsException
    Throws an exception in the case that too few arguments are given.
    TooManyArgumentsException
    Throws an exception in the case that too many arguments are given.
    XMLException
    Errors related to XML input/output.
